name: GOVERNMENT OF U.S. VIRGIN ISLANDS
sampleDescriptions: Federal hurricane disaster legislation, including H.R. 4667 and H.R. 1652.
Disaster relief assistance, including extension of Medicaid assistance as part of the H.R. 4378, the continuing resolution for FY 2020.
Disaster relief assistance, including extension of Medicaid assistance as part of the H.R. 4378, the continuing resolution for FY 2020, and H.R. 1865, the domestic spending appropriations minibus.

Disaster and COVID-19 relief assistance legislation, including the CARES Act (H.R. 748), the proposed HEROES Act (H.R. 6800), and the proposed SMART Act (S. 3752), as well as appropriations measures for FY 2021.

Disaster relief assistance, including extension of Medicaid assistance as part of the H.R. 4378, the continuing resolution for FY 2021 (H.R. 8337), and H.R. 1865, the domestic spending appropriations minibus.

Hurricane and pandemic disaster relief assistance, including extension of Medicaid assistance as part of H.R. 4378 and potential cancellation of Community Disaster Loan obligations, state and local government assistance, and other measures as part of H.R. 133, the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2021.
Awarding of federal grant money to support the Crown Bay Terminal in St. Thomas.
Authorization of a Visa Waiver Program applicable to cruise line, air travel, and charter boat passengers traveling to the U.S. Virgin Islands.

Hurricane and pandemic disaster relief assistance, including extension of Medicaid assistance as part of H.R. 4378 and potential cancellation of Community Disaster Loan obligations, state and local government assistance, and other measures as part of H.R. 1319, the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021.
Advocacy in support of GILTI relief or reform and making the rum carryover rate provision of the tax code permanent.

Hurricane and pandemic disaster relief assistance, including extension of Medicaid assistance as part of H.R. 4378 and potential cancellation of Community Disaster Loan obligations, state and local government assistance, and other measures as part of H.R. 133, the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2021, and H.R. 1319, the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021.
Matters related to the shutdown of the Limetree Bay Refinery.

Hurricane and pandemic disaster relief assistance, including extension of Medicaid assistance as part of H.R. 4378 and potential cancellation of Community Disaster Loan obligations, state and local government assistance, and other measures as part of H.R. 133, the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2021, and H.R. 1319, the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021, the National Defense Authorization Act of 2021, H.R. 4350, the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act,  Pub. L. No. 117-58, and the Build Back Better Act, H.R. 5376.
Assisting client in dealing with the EPA on matters related to EPAs closing of the St. Croix refinery.

Hurricane and disaster relief funding, including H.R. 2471, the omnibus spending bill for FY 2022 and economic development and tourism promotion, including H.R. 5460, the Virgin Islands Visa Waiver Act of 2021. Removal of the Territory from the European Unions tax haven blacklist.
Acceptance of direction letter to pay matching fund receipts to Special Purpose Securitization Corporation for stabilization of USVI Government Employees Retirement System (GERS).
Removal of the Territory from the European Unions tax haven blacklist.

Hurricane and disaster relief funding, including territorial highway funding formula in H.R. 5376, and economic development and tourism promotion, including H.R. 5460, the Virgin Islands Visa Waiver Act of 2021.
Removal of the Territory from the European Unions tax haven blacklist and permanent extension of the rum carryover provisions of the Internal Revenue Code.

Hurricane and disaster relief funding, economic development, and tourism promotion, including H.R. 2617, the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2023, and H.R. 5460, the Virgin Islands Visa Waiver Act of 2021.
